channel.title: Mage PvM
channel.description:
Off Topic: I'm new to rsps coding/developing, and I'm trying to create my first server. Just running it locally and then going to BETA on Hamachi with a few friends to test the server out, and once I get it glitch/bug free as much as I'd like it, and to where the server would run successfully with others actively playing I'll start hosting it publicly.
On Topic: I was curious if anyone would mind helping me out with fixing my mage on my server. Every time mage is used on a npc, it glitches your character to where you won't hit anything, with mage, melee, or range until you relog. I'd appreciate it if anyone would help me.
PS: Flame/Ignorance isn't needed. I'm an amateur java coder, but I'm starting to like rsps coding, and help would really be nice. Everyone needs help sometime in there life. ;)

item.title: Mage PvM
item.dc:creator: @Faded.Fear Faded.Fear
item.description:
@Faded.Fear wrote:

Glazy:

Hmm, Welcome to RSPS Coding! I am not the type of person to say give up if your new. I think it’s good more people are getting into RSPS coding. What revision is your current source? I would recommend switching it as your problem could be quite difficult to fix…

Thanks bro, to be honest, I’m not quite sure what the base is… It seems like someone just released it and it’s sloppily coded… As I’ve fixed multiple errors (112+) since I downloaded it… facepalm
It’s supposeably a 317, but it seems like it may be a 600+, but I’m new to rsps coding, so I’m not quite sure…

Off-Topic: Hmm… Does anyone know of a good source+client to start off with?
(I’ve tried looking, I mainly like 317-508 or whatever it is before they start getting too graphic.)
I’m trying to find a good base to start with and create to my own style and the one I have doesn’t seem to great…

Read full topic

Off Topic: I’m new to rsps coding/developing, and I’m trying to create my first server. Just running it locally and then going to BETA on Hamachi with a few friends to test the server out, and once I get it glitch/bug free as much as I’d like it, and to where the server would run successfully with others actively playing I’ll start hosting it publicly.
